entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor wasm .NET 6 rc2 unable to use RegisterForJavaScript RootComponents when publishing #38044
  • Reconsider EditorForAsync/DisplayForAsync for ASP.NET 7 #38043
  • .NET 6 Blazor typeparam constraints causing compilation error #38041
  • How to authorize SignalR Hub for both Identity Role OR JwtBearerDefaults.AuthenticationScheme? #38039
  • Startup improvement: connectionclose #38038
  • .NET 6 Blazor Hot Reload fails depending on the port specified for the application Url #38029
    6.0.x
  • project Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor build fail #38028
  • [Breaking change]: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Transport.Libuv and Libuv.dll removed from 7.0 #38022
    Discussions
  • Virtualize: Accessibility (scrolling by keyboard) is broken when using ItemsProvider #38020
    6.0-docs-infra
  • WebAssembly RemoteRegisterPath/RemoteProfilePath don't work on an external origin #38015
    Backlog
  • Startup regression: json #38012
  • POST_ClientCancellationBidirectional_RequestAbortRaised(protocol: Http2) test failure #38008
  • [Feature Request] Better support Dependency Inversion with SignalR Core #38007

Closed

  • TypeNameHandling not working with abstract classes: "Type specified in JSON 'T' was not resolved." #37986
  • Flaky Test: Timeout for RequestTests.ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnServerFIN(listenOptionsName: "Loopback") #37750
    Next sprint planning
  • Test Failure: `ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnServerAbort` #35686
    Backlog
  • Correct `ConnectionNotClosedWhenClientSatisfiesMinimumDataRateGivenLargeResponseHeaders` test #26306
    Next sprint planning
  • ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnClientFIN fails due to timeout #23043
    Next sprint planning
  • Test failure in WritingToConnectionAfterUnobservedCloseTriggersRequestAbortedToken #33455
    Next sprint planning
  • Blazor server-side project with windows authentication does not work from command line #23145
    6.0.0
  • Blazor: Hot reload and WASM pre-render do not work together #33320
    6.0.0
  • Blazor Child Components Refresh when InputText onchange fires #38021
  • dotnet watch run does not reload application in a Blazor wasm app #37708
    6.0.x
  • Hot Reload with dotnet watch run doen't work. The call /_framework/blazor-hotreload returns status 204 #36745
    6.0.0
  • Add fsi to dotnet watch #38037
  • MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute callback not invoked in .NET 6 Preview 5 #37100
  • Blazor DI Service required #38023
  • File Upload with <InputFile> creates corrupted file in ASP.NET Core 6.0.0-rc.2.21480.5 #38019
  • [dotnet-watch] Hot Reload - Provide a way to suppress rude edit dialog #37023
  • HotReload - Blazor WA - is not working with Radzen components #37498
  • Document How to Enable Hot Reloading Using dotnet run/watch #38036
  • [API Proposal]: Support dotnet watch in launchSettings.json #37896
  • Startup improvement: json #38013
  • Perf regression: updates #37975
  • Need to have a way to indicate whether a component uses attribute-splatting or not #21564
    .NET 7 Planning
  • In Blazor project when exception is thrown in the markup part of .razor component then VS should show WHERE in the markup the exception was thrown. #21782
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Improve the error experience in a wrong binding situation #21950
    .NET 7 Planning
  • RouteConstraints aren't linker friendly #24723
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Memory leakage when using 'return' during rendering logic #27429
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Drawn controls support for Blazor #37281
    Backlog
  • Remove Libuv transport #38002
    7.0-preview1
  • ServerCanAbortConnectionAfterUnobservedClose-Loopback test failure #37990
  • Flaky test - WriteAfterConnectionCloseNoops-http_127.0.0.1_0 #36931
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Slightly flaky test: `UnixDomainSocketsTest.TestUnixDomainSocketWithUrl()` #28067
    Next sprint planning
  • blazor-wasm publish missing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.dll #37994
  • Expose Use(Func<RequestDelegate, RequestDelegate> middleware) on WebApplication #37346
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM RTM 3.2 with Identity Server fails if app name contains period '.' #22071
    Backlog
  • Add "show all routes" command line tool #15206
    Backlog
  • Question: Automatically registering routes for 3.0 #14469
    Backlog
  • ILEmitTrieFactory isn't linker friendly #24725
    .NET 7 Planning
  • WebApplicationBuilder does not canonicalize the --contentRoot argument #36416
    6.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/2.1] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #38042
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, 2.1.x
  • Fix for remember browser #38040
    area-identity
  • Update branding to 6.0.1 #38027
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, api-suggestion
  • Update Chrome and Selenium Versions #38024
    area-infrastructure
  • Modify Mvc.Analyzer tests to use Roslyn test infrastructure #38010
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [SPA] Updates npm dependencies #37776
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 3.1.22
  • Improve linker friendliness for RouteOptions #38014
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update branding for 5.0.13 #38031
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.13
  • [release/2.1] Include SharedFx bundle in Hosting Bundle, instead of SharedFx .msi #36890
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.31
  • Update branding for 3.1.22 #38030
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.22
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37979
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.22
  • Add default values to the documentation #38017
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Add default value to documentation #38018
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/2.1] Use new Hosted build pools #37159
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.31
  • [release/3.1] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37819
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 3.1.22
  • Unquarantine shared tests #38026
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Add warning when targeting release/* branches #38006
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Make in-memory HTTP/2 tests more deterministic #37948
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove Libuv transport and dependency #38005
    breaking-change, area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Expose Use as a public method on WebApplication #38011
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-hosting, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine flaky tests #38009
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update SDK #38001
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies #37739
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37980
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/5.0] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37818
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 5.0.13
  • Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37879
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/5.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37968
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 5.0.13
  • Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37966
    area-runtime
  • [release/3.1] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37969
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 3.1.22
  • [release/6.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37967
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37816
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.1
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Unquarantine `AuthorizeViewCases_RequirePolicy_Authorized` #37717
    area-blazor
  • Fix typo in Web API template option description (#37780) #37914
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.1
